+Ray

首頁

git page blog with jekyll

check gem version

  • gem -v
  • update Gem (sudo)
  • gem update –system

jekyll

  • jekyll official
  • use gem install jekyll (sudo)

  • $ gem install jekyll

    查詢jekyll 版本

    $ jekyll -v

    cd blog folder

    jekyll build

    jekyll serve

    http://localhost:4000

git page

push gh-pages branch

$ git checkout --orphan gh-pages

$ git push origin gh-pages
